name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. W. Gustave McGEORGE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. McGeorge

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. W. Gustave McGEORGE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 22nd day of January, 1997, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board dated November 27,1996, it is hereby
ORDERED that W. GUSTAVE McGEORGE, be and he is SUSPENDED from the Bar of this Commonwealth for a period of one (1) year and one day, retroactive to March 1, 1996, and he shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217 Pa.R.D.E.
It is further ORDERED that respondent shall pay costs to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
688 A.2d 1171
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. W. Gustave McGEORGE, Respondent.
No. 909, Disciplinary Docket No. 2—Supreme Court.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 22, 1997.
